Pre-Game Insights: India squad: Hardik Pandya (c), Suryakumar Yadav, Ishan Kishan (wk), Ruturaj Gaikwad, Shubman Gill, Deepak Hooda, Rahul Tripathi, Jitesh Sharma (wk), Washington Sundar, Kuldeep Yadav, Yuzvendra Chahal, Arshdeep Singh, Umran Malik, Shivam Mavi, Prithvi Shaw, Mukesh Kumar; New Zealand squad: Mitchell Santner (c), Finn Allen, Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Dane Cleaver (wk), Devon Conway (wk), Jacob Duffy, Lockie Ferguson, Ben Lister, Daryl Mitchell, Glenn Phillips, Michael Rippon, Henry Shipley, Ish Sodhi, Blair Tickner
Miscellaneous Highlights: The live stream of the match can be viewed on ESPN Player in the UK, starting from 12.30pm GMT, with the first ball at 1.30pm.
In New Zealand, the match can be watched on Sky Sport 1, starting from 2.50am NZT.
In India, the match can be watched on Star Sports 1 and Disney+ Hotstar.
In the US, the match can be viewed on ESPN Plus and Willow.
In Australia, the match can be viewed on Fox Cricket and Kayo Sports.
